requirement.title: Parameter for setting the TTI block merging behaviour
requirement.description: A parameter (-s) exists, that allows for disabling the TTI block merging of subtitles that are split into several TTI blocks. Merging these TTI blocks is the default behaviour. When the parameter "-s" is set, TTI blocks are not merged.

requirement.title: Parameter for clearing the UDA field
requirement.description: A parameter (-a) exists, that allows to clear the User-Defined Area (UDA) field of the GSI block. This field contains user defined data and can be used e.g. for proprietary data of subtitle editors. Keeping the UDA field content is the default behaviour.

requirement.title: Parameter for discarding User Data TTI blocks
requirement.description: A parameter (-u) exists, that allows to discard TTI blocks that consist of user data i.e. for which the EBN field is set to 0xFE. In such a case the Text Field (TF) contains user defined data and can be used e.g. for proprietary data of subtitle editors. Keeping such TTI blocks can lead to issues in case that data consists of a copy of the subtitle text (in a proprietary format) in addition to the original (standard compliant) subtitle text. Keeping TTI blocks as described is the default behaviour.

requirement.title: Parameter for storing the source STL file
requirement.description: A parameter (-b) exists, that allows to store the source STL file below the StlSource element in a Data child element, encoded as Base64. The filename of that file is stored in a Filename child element of the StlSource element. If the input is the standard input (STDIN), the filename "stdin" is used. If the parameter is not set, the default behaviour applies. In this case the source STL file will not be stored.

requirement.title: Parameter for overwriting the filename of the stored source STL file
requirement.description: A parameter (-f) exists, that allows to overwrite the filename of the stored source STL file, if the parameter to store that file is used (if that parameter is not used, the parameter in question has no effect). If the parameter is not set, the default behaviour applies. In this case the original filename of the stored source STL file will not be overwritten.

requirement.title: STL XML to EBU STL
requirement.description: There is an option to transform an STL XML file in an STL file.

requirement.title: GSI Header - length
requirement.description: The STL file's GSI Header has a length of 1024 Bytes (0 to 1023) according to EBU Tech 3264 (p.5).

requirement.title: TTI Block - length
requirement.description: A TTI block in the created STL file has a length of 128 Bytes according to EBU Tech 3264 (p.5).

requirement.title: GSI Header - content
requirement.description: The elements' information is mapped to the correct bytes within the GSI header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: GSI Header - order
requirement.description: The order of the elements written within the GSI header is the same as depicted in EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Character Encoding
requirement.description: The characters in the STL XML file's elements' content is encoded according to the Code Page referenced in the CPN element according to EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 1 (p.15-17). Only the content of the TF element is encoded according to the Character Code Table referenced in the CCT element according to EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 2 (p.19-23).

requirement.title: Code Page Number mapping
requirement.description: The Code Page number (CPN) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 0 to 2 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). The Bytes' values are thus either 34 33 37, 38 35 30, 38 36 30, 38 36 33 or 38 36 35 hex.

requirement.title: Code Page Number mapping (subset)
requirement.description: When the codepage is 850 the Code Page number (CPN) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 0 to 2 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4) and the Bytes' values are 38 35 30 hex.

requirement.title: Disk Format Code mapping
requirement.description: The Disk Format Code (DFC) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 3 to 10 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). The Bytes' values expressed as string are thus either "STL25.01" or "STL30.01".

requirement.title: Display Standard Code mapping
requirement.description: The Display Standard Code (DSC) element's information is mapped to the Byte 11 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). The Byte's value is thus either 20, 30, 31 or 32 hex.

requirement.title: Character Code Table Number mapping
requirement.description: The Character Code Table Number (CCT) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 12 to 13 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). The Bytes' values thus are either 30 30, 30 31, 30 32, 30 33 or 30 34 hex.

requirement.title: Character Code Table Number mapping (subset)
requirement.description: When the value refers to ISO 6937 the Character Code Table Number (CCT) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 12 to 13 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4) (in this case the Bytes' values are 30 30 hex).

requirement.title: Language Code mapping
requirement.description: The Language Code (LC) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 14 to 15 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). The Bytes' values thus are one of those given in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 3 (p.25-26).

requirement.title: Original Programme Title mapping
requirement.description: The Original Programme Title (OPT) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 16 to 47 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Original Episode Title mapping
requirement.description: The Original Episode Title (OET) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 48 to 79 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Translated Programme Title mapping
requirement.description: The Translated Programme Title (TPT) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 80 to 111 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Translated Episode Title mapping
requirement.description: The Translated Episode Title (TET) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 112 to 143 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Translator's Name mapping
requirement.description: The Translator's Name (TN) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 144 to 175 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Translator's Contact Details mapping
requirement.description: The Translator's Contact Details (TCD) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 176 to 207 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Subtitle List Reference Code mapping
requirement.description: The Subtitle List Reference Code (SLR) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 208 to 223 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Creation Date mapping
requirement.description: The Creation Date (CD) element's information is set to the current date according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4) and written in the Bytes 224 to 229. The format is according to ISO Standard 8601 (i.e. YYMMDD) encoded in hex.

requirement.title: Revision Date mapping
requirement.description: The Revision Date (RD) element's information is set to the current date according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4) and written in the Bytes 230 to 235. The format is according to ISO Standard 8601 (i.e. YYMMDD) encoded in hex.

requirement.title: Revision Number mapping
requirement.description: The Revision Number (RN) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 236 to 237 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Total Number of Text and Timing Information block mapping
requirement.description: The Total Number of Text and Timing Information (TTI) blocks (TNB) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 238 to 242 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Total Number of Subtitles mapping
requirement.description: The Total Number of Subtitles (TNS) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 243 to 247 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Total Number of Subtitle Groups mapping
requirement.description: The Total Number of Subtitle Groups (TNG) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 248 to 250 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Maximum Number of Displayable Characters in any text row mapping
requirement.description: The Maximum Number of Displayable Characters in any text row (MNC) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 251 to 252 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Maximum Number of Displayable Rows mapping
requirement.description: The Maximum Number of Displayable Rows (MNR) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 253 to 254 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Time Code: Status mapping
requirement.description: The Time Code: Status (TCS) element's information is mapped to the Byte 255 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). They Byte's value thus is either 30 or 31 hex.

requirement.title: Time Code: Start-of-Programme mapping
requirement.description: The Time Code: Start-of-Programme (TCP) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 256 to 263 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Time Code: First In-Cue mapping
requirement.description: The Time Code: First In-Cue (TCF) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 264 to 271 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Total Number of Disks mapping
requirement.description: The Total Number of Disks (TND) element's information is mapped to the Byte 272 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Disk Sequence Number mapping
requirement.description: The Disk Sequence Number (DSN) element's information is mapped to the Byte 273 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4).

requirement.title: Country of Origin mapping
requirement.description: The Country of Origin (CO) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 274 to 276 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). The resulting code is one of those given in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 4 (p.27-30).

requirement.title: Publisher mapping
requirement.description: The Publisher (PUB) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 277 to 308 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Editor's Name mapping
requirement.description: The Editor's Name (EN) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 309 to 340 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Editor's Contact Details mapping
requirement.description: The Editor's Contact Details (ECD) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 341 to 372 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: User-Defined Area mapping
requirement.description: The User-Defined Area (UDA) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 448 to 1023 of the GSI Header according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 1 (p.4). Unused Bytes are set to 20 hex.

requirement.title: Unused Bytes handling
requirement.description: All unused Bytes in the GSI block are set to 20h according to EBU Tech 3264 (p.9).

requirement.title: TTI Block - mapping
requirement.description: The elements' information is mapped to the correct bytes within a TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10).

requirement.title: TTI Block - order
requirement.description: The order of the elements written within a TTI block is the same as depicted in EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10).

requirement.title: Subtitle Group Number mapping
requirement.description: The Subtitle Group Number (SGN) element's information is mapped to the Byte 0 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Byte's value is thus in the range of 00 to FF hex.

requirement.title: Subtitle Number mapping
requirement.description: The Subtitle Number (SN) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 1 to 2 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Bytes' values are thus in the range of 0000 to FFFF hex.

requirement.title: Extension Block Number mapping
requirement.description: The Extension Block Number (EBN) element's information is mapped to the Byte 3 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Byte's value is thus in the range off 00 to FF hex.

requirement.title: Cumulative Status mapping
requirement.description: The Cumulative Status (CS) element's information is mapped to the Byte 4 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Byte's value is thus either 00, 01, 02 or 03 hex.

requirement.title: Time Code In mapping
requirement.description: The Time Code In (TCI) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 5 to 8 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The value of Byte 5 is in the range of 00 to 17h. The value of Byte 6 is in the range of 00 to 3B hex. The value of Byte 7 is in the range of 00 to 3B hex. The value of Byte 8 is in the range of 00 to 18 hex for a DFC of "STL25.01" or 00 to 1D hex for a DFC of "STL30.01".

requirement.title: Time Code Out mapping
requirement.description: The Time Code Out (TCO) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 9 to 12 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The value of Byte 9 is in the range of 00 to 17h. The value of Byte 10 is in the range of 00 to 3B hex. The value of Byte 11 is in the range of 00 to 3B hex. The value of Byte 12 is in the range of 00 to 18 hex for a DFC of "STL25.01" or 00 to 1D hex for a DFC of "STL30.01".

requirement.title: Vertical Position mapping
requirement.description: The Vertical Position (VP) element's information is mapped to the Byte 13 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Byte's value is thus either in the range of 01 to 17 hex for teletext subtitles or in the range of 00 to the value of the MNR field for in-vision subtitles (max. 63 hex).

requirement.title: Justification Code mapping
requirement.description: The Justification Code (JC) element's information is mapped to the Byte 14 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Byte's value is thus either 00, 01, 02 or 03 hex.

requirement.title: Comment Flag mapping
requirement.description: The Comment Flag (CF) element's information is mapped to the Byte 15 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). The Byte's value is thus either 00 or 01 hex.

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - content
requirement.description: The Text Field (TF) element's information is mapped to the Bytes 16 to 127 of the TTI block according to EBU Tech 3264 Table 2 (p.10). Does not apply to TTI Blocks with User Data (EBN value 0xFE).

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - ignore undesired characters
requirement.description: Undesired characters (like line breaks, tabs or spaces) within a TTI block's Text field (TF) which are already represented by regarding XML elements shall not be mapped to STL.

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - user data
requirement.description: If the TTI block contains user data (EBN = FE hex), the base64 encoded data is decoded back to its binary representation.

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Control Codes
requirement.description: Control code elements within a TTI block's Text field (TF) are mapped with the appropriate hex values representing these Control Code element.

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Characters CCT 00
requirement.description: When the Character Code Table in the GSI Header is set to '00' characters within a TTI block's Text field (TF) are encoded according to CCT 00 (Latin alphabet) as defined in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 2 (p.19-23). This does not apply to TTI Blocks with User Data (EBN value 0xFE).

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Characters CCT 01
requirement.description: When the Character Code Table in the GSI Header is set to '01' characters within a TTI block's Text field (TF) are encoded according to CCT 01 (Latin/Cyrillic alphabet) as defined in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 2 (p.19-23). This does not apply to TTI Blocks with User Data (EBN value 0xFE).

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Characters CCT 02
requirement.description: When the Character Code Table in the GSI Header is set to '02' characters within a TTI block's Text field (TF) are encoded according to CCT 02 (Latin/Arabic alphabet) as defined in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 2 (p.19-23). Does not apply to TTI Blocks with User Data (EBN value 0xFE).

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Characters CCT 03
requirement.description: When the Character Code Table in the GSI Header is set to '03' characters within a TTI block's Text field (TF) are encoded according to CCT 03 (Latin/Greek alphabet) as defined in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 2 (p.19-23). Does not apply to TTI Blocks with User Data (EBN value 0xFE).

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Characters CCT 04
requirement.description: When the Character Code Table in the GSI Header is set to '04' characters within a TTI block's Text field (TF) are encoded according to CCT 04 (Latin/Hebrew alphabet) as defined in EBU Tech 3264 Appendix 2 (p.19-23). Does not apply to TTI Blocks with User Data (EBN value 0xFE).

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - Text

requirement.title: Text Field mapping - length

requirement.title: EBU-TT to EBU-TT-D
requirement.description: There is an option to transform an EBU-TT file that was generated from an STL XML file into an EBU-TT-D file.

requirement.title: offsetInSeconds parameter
requirement.description: There is a parameter called "offsetInSeconds", that describes if an offset shall be used for the time codes or not. The value of the parameter is either "0" if no offset shall be used, or the value of the desired offset in seconds. If the parameter has a value different than 0, this offset is subtracted from all begin and end attributes' values. If the result is a negative time expression the processing is aborted.

requirement.title: xml:space attribute mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file created from an EBU-TT file has its root element's xml:space attribute set to the same value as the EBU-TT file's root element's xml:space attribute. If the xml:space attribute is not set in the EBU-TT file, the EBU-TT-D file has its xml:space attribute set to "default".

requirement.title: ttp:timeBase attribute mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:tt root element has exactly one ttp:timeBase attribute with a value of type xs:string set to "media" according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.13).

requirement.title: ttp:cellResolution attribute mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file created from an EBU-TT file has its root element's ttp:cellResolution attribute set to the same value as the EBU-TT file's root element's ttp:cellResolution attribute. If the ttp:cellResolution attribute is not set in the EBU-TT file, the EBU-TT-D file has its ttp:cellResolution attribute set to "50 30".

requirement.title: xml:lang attribute mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file created from an EBU-TT file has its root element's xml:lang attribute set to the same value as the EBU-TT file's root element's xml:lang attribute.

requirement.title: ebuttm:documentCopyright element mapping
requirement.description: If the EBU-TT file's tt:head element has a ebuttm:documentCopyright child element, the EBU-TT-D file's tt:head element has a ttm:copyright child element with its value taken from the EBU-TT file's ebuttm:documentCopyright element. Otherwise the element is not mapped.

requirement.title: Elements not mapped
requirement.description: The following elements are not mapped from EBU-TT to EBU-TT-D according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.16): ebuttm:documentReadingSpeed, ebuttm:binaryData, ebuttm:documentOriginalProgrammeTitle, ebuttm:documentOriginalEpisodeTitle, ebuttm:documentTranslatedProgrammeTitle, ebuttm:documentTranslatedEpisodeTitle, ebuttm:documentTotalNumberOfSubtitles, ebuttm:documentMaximumNumberOfDisplayableCharacterInAnyRow, ebuttm:documentSubtitleListReferenceCode, ebuttm:documentStartOfProgramme.

requirement.title: Schema conformity
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file conforms to the EBU-TT-D XSD.

requirement.title: Copied elements
requirement.description: The following elements, if existent, are copied from EBU-TT to EBU-TT-D with all their respective attributes and content according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.16). They are placed as children of the ebuttm:documentMetadata element: ebuttm:documentIdentifier, ebuttm:documentOriginatingSystem, ebuttm:documentTargetAspectRatio, ebuttm:documentTargetActiveFormatDescriptor, ebuttm:documentIntendedTargetBarData, ebuttm:documentIntendedTargetFormat, ebuttm:documentTranslatorsName, ebuttm:documentTranslatorsContactDetails, ebuttm:documentCountryOfOrigin, ebuttm:documentPublisher, ebuttm:documentEditorsName, ebuttm:documentEditorsContactDetails, ebuttm:documentUserDefinedArea, ttm:agent.

requirement.title: ebuttm:authoredFrameRate element mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's ebuttm:authoredFrameRate element is mapped from the EBU-TT file's tt:tt element's ttp:frameRate attribute.

requirement.title: ebuttm:authoredFrameRateMultiplier element mapping
requirement.description: If available the EBU-TT-D file's ebuttm:authoredFrameRateMultiplier element is taken from the EBU-TT file's tt:tt element's ttp:frameRateMultiplier attribute. Otherwise this metadata element is not set.

requirement.title: offsetInFrames Parameter
requirement.description: There is a parameter called "offsetInFrames", that describes if an offset shall be used. The value of the parameter is either not set, if no offset shall be used, or the value of the desired offset in the format "HH:MM:SS:FF" (where H = hours, M = minutes, S = seconds and F = frames). If the parameter is set, this offset is subtracted from all begin and end attributes' values. Only positive values are supported.

requirement.title: offsetStartOfProgramme Parameter
requirement.description: There is a parameter, e.g. named "offsetStartOfProgramme", that is used to express that the ebuttm:documentStartOfProgramme element timecode is the time-offset that's used for the begin and end attributes. To enable this offset, the parameter has to be set to 1; the default is 0.

requirement.title: tt:style element mapping - defaultStyle
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:styling element has at least one tt:style child element. Exactly one tt:styling element's xml:id attribute has the value "defaultStyle".

requirement.title: tt:style element mapping - tts:background
requirement.description: The EBU-TT file's tt:style elements' tts:color attribute and tts:background attribute of type ebuttdt:colorType (only hex notation and named colors) are mapped to the EBU-TT-D file's tt:style elements' tts:color attribute and tts:background attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionColorType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.2 (p.34). Named colors are mapped according to the table in TTML1 8.3.10.

requirement.title: tt:style element mapping - tts:fontSize
requirement.description: The EBU-TT file's tt:style elements' tts:fontSize attribute of type ebuttdt:fontSizeType is mapped to the EBU-TT-D file's tt:style elements' tts:fontSize attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionFontSizeType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.5 (p.35). Thus the values of this type are non-negative numbers of type xs:decimal appended by the percentage sign "%". If the EBU-TT file's tt:style element's tts:fontSize attribute is set to '1c 1c', the EBU-TT-D file's tt:style element's tts:fontsize attribute is mapped to '100%'. If it is set to '1c 2c', it gets mapped to '200%'. Other values are currently not supported.

requirement.title: tt:style element mapping - tts:lineHeight
requirement.description: The EBU-TT file's tt:style elements' tts:lineHeight attribute of type ebuttdt:lineHeightType is mapped to the EBU-TT-D file's tt:style elements' tts:lineHeight attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionLineHeightType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.8 (p.35). Thus the type of this value is the string "normal" or a non-negative number of type xs:decimal appended by the percentage sign "%". If the value from the EBU-TT file matches this type it can be copied, otherwise the value needs to be transformed into a percentage representation of the value.

requirement.title: useLineHeight125Percent Parameter
requirement.description: There is a parameter called "useLineHeight125Percent" that (if set to 1) allows to use the value "125%" (instead of the special value "normal") for the line height, to NOT let the renderer choose an appropriate value.

requirement.title: tt:style element mapping - attributes
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:style elements are mapped to the EBU-TT file's tt:style elements with regard of the supported style attributes according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.18 - p.22). The following attributes can be copied from the EBU-TT file: xml:id, tts:direction, tts:fontFamily, tts:textAlign, tts:fontStyle, tts:fontWeight, tts:textDecoration, tts:unicodeBidi, ebutts:multiRowAlign.

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping - tts:extent
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:region elements' tts:extent attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionExtentType is mapped to the EBU-TT file's tt:region elements' tts:extent attribute of type ebuttdt:extentType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.3 (p.34). Thus the values of this type are non-negative numbers of type xs:decimal appended by the percentage sign "%" with the first value expressing the width and the second value expressing the height. If the EBU-TT file uses % values the values are copied, if the EBU-TT file uses a cell or pixel metric the percentage values are calculated so that proportional relationship to height and width of the root container are kept.

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping - tts:origin
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:region elements' tts:origin attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionOriginType is mapped to the EBU-TT file's tt:region elements' tts:origin attribute of type ebuttdt:originType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.3 (p.34). Thus the values of this type are non-negative numbers of type xs:decimal appended by the percentage sign "%" with the first value expressing the offset in x-direction and the second value expressing the offset in y-direction. If the EBU-TT file uses % values the values are copied, if the EBU-TT file uses a cell or pixel metric the percentage values are calculated so that proportional relationship to height and width of the root container are kept.

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping - tts:padding
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:region elements' tts:padding attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionPaddingType is mapped to the EBU-TT file's tt:region elements' tts:padding attribute of type ebuttdt:PaddingType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.3 (p.34). Thus the values of this type are non-negative numbers of type xs:decimal appended by the percentage sign "%". Depending on the amount of values given within the attribute, the mapping is done according to the meaning described in EBU Tech 3380 4.10 (p.36). If the EBU-TT file uses % values the values are copied, if the EBU-TT file uses a cell metric the percentage values are calculated so that proportional relationship to height and width of the root container are kept. The "px" metric are mapped by default to "80% 80%" until this metric is supported in this conversion as well.

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping - attributes
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:region elements are taken from the EBU-TT file's tt:region elements with regard of the supported style attributes according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.23 - p.26). The following attributes can be copied: xml:id, style, tts:displayAlign, tts:writingMode. The mapping of all other attributes is handled in separate requirements.

requirement.title: tt:div element mapping - attributes
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:div elements' attributes are copied from the EBU-TT file's tt:div elements' attributes with regard of the supported attributes according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.28 - p.29). The following attributes can be copied: xml:id, region, style.

requirement.title: tt:p element mapping - attributes
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:p elements' attributes are copied from the EBU-TT file's tt:p elements' attributes with regard of the supported attributes according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.29 - p.32). The following attributes can be copied: xml:id, xml:space, xml:lang, region, style, ttm:role, ttm:agent.

requirement.title: tt:p element mapping - begin
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:p elements' begin attributes are taken from the EBU-TT file's tt:p elements' begin attributes. The format of the EBU-TT-D file's tt:p element's begin attributes has the form hh:mm:ss.ms (hh = hours, mm = minutes, ss = seconds, ms = milliseconds / fraction). If the timebase of the EBU-TT file is SMPTE the value is calculated according to the specified frameRate, frameRateMultiplier and DropFrame. If the timecode of in the source document does not conform to the expected value (taking into account the framerate) transformation exits with an error message.

requirement.title: tt:p element mapping - end
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:p elements' end attributes are taken from the EBU-TT file's tt:p elements' end attributes. The format of the EBU-TT-D file's tt:p element's begin attributes has the form hh:mm:ss.ms (hh = hours, mm = minutes, ss = seconds, ms = milliseconds / fraction). If the timebase of the EBU-TT file is SMPTE the value is calculated according to the specified frameRate, frameRateMultiplier and DropFrame. If the timecode of in the source document does not conform to the expected value (taking into account the framerate) transformation exits with an error message.

requirement.title: tt:span element mapping - begin and end attributes
requirement.description: An EBU-TT file's tt:span elements' begin and end attribute of either type ebuttdt:smpteTimingType or type ebuttdt:mediaTimingType are mapped to the created EBU-TT-D file's tt:span elements' begin and end attribute of type ebuttdt:distributionMediaTimingType according to the datatype definition in EBU Tech 3380 4.12 (p.36) taking into account frameRate, frameRateMultiplier and dropMode when the timebase is "smpte".

requirement.title: tt:span element mapping - attributes
requirement.description: An EBU-TT-D file's tt:span elements' attributes are copied from the EBU-TT file's tt:span elements' attributes with regard of the supported attributes according to EBU Tech 3380 (p.32 - p.34). The following attributes can be copied: xml:id, xml:space, xml:lang, style, ttm:role, ttm:agent.

requirement.title: ebuttm:conformsToStandard element
requirement.description: The conformance to the EBU Spec 3380 is signalled through the addition of the ebuttm:conformsToStandard element as the first child of the ebuttm:documentMetadata element.

requirement.title: ttp:timebase attribute mapping
requirement.description: The ttp:timebase attribute of the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file's tt:tt root element is set to "media" according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.2).

requirement.title: ttp:cellResolution attribute mapping
requirement.description: The ttp:cellResolution attribute of the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file's tt:tt root element is set to "50 30" according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.2).

requirement.title: xml:lang attribute mapping
requirement.description: The xml:lang attribute of the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file's tt:tt root element is taken from the EBU-TT-D file's tt:tt root element's xml:lang attribute according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.2).

requirement.title: XML comment
requirement.description: An XML comment set prior to the tt:tt root element hints to the used profile in the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.2).

requirement.title: ebuttm:documentEbuttVersion element mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file's ebuttm:documentEbuttVersion element has its value set to "v1.0" according to EBU Tech 3350 3.1.1.1 (p.19).

requirement.title: tt:styling element mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file's tt:styling element in the tt:head element has a tt:style element with its xml:id attribute set to "defaultStyle" according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.3). Its other attributes are set as follows: tts:fontFamily="Verdana, Arial, Tiresias", tts:fontSize="160%", tts:lineHeight="125%".

requirement.title: tt:style elements - tts:backgroundColor
requirement.description: Every tt:style element in the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file that has a tts:color attribute set, has its tts:backgroundColor attribute set to the value "#000000c2".

requirement.title: tt:style element - tts:textAlign
requirement.description: There are exactly three style elements in the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file that have a tts:textAlign attribute set. Exactly one tt:style element has the value "center" set, exactly one has the value "left" set and exactly one has the value "right" set according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.9). These styles are only referenced by tt:p elements.

requirement.title: tt:style element - tts:color
requirement.description: There are only eight allowed style elements in the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file that have their tts:color attributes set. The supported values are #000000 hex, #ffffff hex, #ff0000 hex, #00ff00 hex, #0000ff hex, #ffff00 hex, #ff00ff hex, #00ffff hex. Each of these eight elements has a different value set so each of the values is set exactly once. Each of these elements has its tts:backgroundColor attribute set to the value "#000000c2"

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:region elements are not mapped to the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file. The EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file has two tt:region elements. For both of them the tts:origin attribute is set to "10% 10%". For both of them the tts:extent attribute is set to "80% 80%". For one of them the tts:displayAlign attribute is set to "after", for the other one it's set to "before" according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.8).

requirement.title: tt:div element mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file created from the EBU-TT-D file has exactly one tt:div element. This element's style attribute is set to "defaultStyle".

requirement.title: tt:element mapping
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:p elements are mapped to the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file.

requirement.title: tt:p element mapping - content
requirement.description: The EBU-TT-D file's tt:p elements' textual content is copied to the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file's tt:p elements. Every textual content is enclosed in a tt:span element. The tt:span elements are not nested.

requirement.title: tt:p element - style
requirement.description: In the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file every tt:p element's style attribute is referencing a style whose tts:textAlign attribute is set according to the subtitle block's intended horizontal alignment according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.9). If there's no horizontal alignment given for this particular subtitle block in the EBU-TT-D file, a style whose tts:textAlign attribute is set to "center" is referenced.

requirement.title: tt:p element mapping - region
requirement.description: In the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file every tt:p element's region attribute is referencing one of the two defined regions depending on its position relative to the height of the video within the EBU-TT-D file. If the upper corner of the tt:p element lies in the upper half of the root container in the EBU-TT-D file, the region attribute of the tt:p element in the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file is referencing the region whose tts:displayAlign attribute is set to "before", otherwise it references to region whose tts:displayAlign attribute is set to "after" according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.10).

requirement.title: tt:p element mapping - begin and end attributes
requirement.description: In the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file a tt:p element's begin and end attributes' values are taken from the respective tt:p element's begin and end attributes in the EBU-TT-D file according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.9). The Milliseconds part is truncated to 3 digits.

requirement.title: tt:span element mapping - content
requirement.description: In the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file every form of textual content is enclosed by a tt:span element according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.9).

requirement.title: tt:span element mapping - style
requirement.description: In the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file every tt:span element's style attribute is referencing a style with the appropriate text color according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.11). The referenced style has its tts:color attribute set to a value that's properly representing the textcolor of the respective tt:span element in the EBU-TT-D file. For example if a tt:span element in the EBU-TT-D file references a style element that results in a reddish colouring of the contained text, the corresponding tt:span element in the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file references a style element that has its tts:color attribute set to "#ff0000" and its tts:backgroundColor attribute to "#000000c2" (the only allowed value for the tts:backgroundColor attribute of a style in EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE).

requirement.title: tt:span element mapping - background color
requirement.description: In the transformation of an EBU-TT-D file to an EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file tt:span elements changing the background color are not mapped to the EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE file since other than the default background colour no colours are supported according to XML-Format fÃ¼r die Distribution von Untertiteln in den ARD Mediatheken (EBU-TT-D-Basic-DE) v1.2 (p.11).

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping - tts:extent in percentage
requirement.description: When the attribute "tts:extent" from the EBU-TT file's element "tt:region" is represented in percentage values, it is mapped to the attribute "tts:extent" of the element "tt:region" in the target EBU-TT-D file. The value can be copied without further transformation.

requirement.title: tt:region element mapping - tts:origin in percentage
requirement.description: When the attribute "tts:origin" from the EBU-TT file's element "tt:region" is represented in percentage values, it is mapped to the attribute "tts:origin" of the element "tt:region" in the target EBU-TT-D file. The value can be copied without further transformation.

requirement.title: Existence StlXml-XSD
requirement.description: There shall be an W3C XML Schema (XSD) that is conformant to the version 1.0 of the XML Schema Standard that can be used to validate the a StlXml file (StlXml-XSD).

requirement.title: StlXml-XSD error reporting
requirement.description: Validation of an XML file with the StlXml-XSD shall not result in false negative validation error messages but may result in false positive error messages.

requirement.title: StlXml content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that StlXml has the elements HEAD and BODY as mandatory children where HEAD is the first and BODY the second child. The StlSource element is an optional child and shall be the third child, if present.

requirement.title: HEAD content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate the HEAD element has the elements "metadata" and GSI as only allowed child, that the GSI child element is mandatory and has the upper bound of "1", that the element "metadata" is optional and has the upper bound of "1", that if present, the "metadata" element is the first child.

requirement.title: GSI content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate the GSI element has only the following elements as child elements, that these elements can not occur more than once, that they are mandatory and that they appear in following order of occurrence: CPN, DFC, DSC, CCT, LC, OPT, OET, TPT, TET, TN, TCD, SLR, CD, RD, RN, TNB, TNS, TNG, MNC, MNR, TCS, TCP, TCF, TND, DSN, CO, PUB, EN, ECD, UDA

requirement.title: BODY content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate the BODY element has the element TTICONTAINER as only allowed child, that this child element is mandatory and has the upper bound of "1".

requirement.title: TTICONTAINER content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate the TTICONTAINER element has only TTI elements as children and that at least one TTI element is present.

requirement.title: TTI content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate a TTI element has only the following elements as child elements, that these elements can not occur more than once, that they are mandatory and that they appear in following order of occurrence: SGN, SN, EBN, CS, TCI, TCO, VP, JC, CF, TF.

requirement.title: CPN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element CPN is of type xs:token and is restricted to the following enumerated values: "437", "850", "860", "863" and "865".

requirement.title: DFC data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element DFC is of type xs:token and is restricted to the following enumerated values: "STL25.01" and "STL30.01".

requirement.title: DSC data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element DSC is of type xs:token and is restricted to the following enumerated values: "", "0", "1" and "2".

requirement.title: CCT data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element CCT is of type xs:token and is restricted to the following enumerated values: "00", "01", "02, "03" and "04".

requirement.title: LC data type generic
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element LC is of type xsd:hexBinary with the length one.

requirement.title: LC data type value list
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element LC has only the values listed in EBU Tech 3264-E Appendix 3 (p.25).

requirement.title: OPT data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element OPT is of type string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: OET data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element OET is of type string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: TPT data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TPT is of type string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: TET data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TET is of type string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: TN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TN is of type string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: TCD data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TCD is of type string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: SLR data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element SLR is of type string and has not more than 16 characters.

requirement.title: CD data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element CD is of type string and has not more than 6 characters.

requirement.title: RD data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element RD is of type string and has not more than 6 characters.

requirement.title: RN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element RN is an integer with the range 0-99.

requirement.title: TNB data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TNB is an integer with the range 0-99999.

requirement.title: TNS data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TNS is an integer with the range 0-99999.

requirement.title: TNG data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TNG is an integer with the range 0-255.

requirement.title: MNC data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element MNC is an integer with the range 0-99.

requirement.title: MNR data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element MNR is an integer with the range 0-99.

requirement.title: TCS data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TCS is of type xs:token with the enumerated values of "0" and "1".

requirement.title: TCP data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TCP is of type string where the first two characters correspond to a zero padded number in the range of 0-23, the third and fourth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59, the fifth and sixth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59 and the seventh and eigth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-29.

requirement.title: TCF data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TCF is of type string where the first two characters correspond to a zero padded number in the range of 0-23, the third and fourth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59, the sixth and seventh character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59 and the eight and ninth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-29.

requirement.title: TND data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TND is an integer in the range 1-9.

requirement.title: DSN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element DSN an integer in the range 1-9.

requirement.title: CO data type generic
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element CO is of type xs:token, has the the length of 3 and has only characters in the range A-z.

requirement.title: CO data type value list
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element CO is one of the country codes listed in EBU Tech 3264-E Appendix 4 (page 27)

requirement.title: PUB data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element PUB is of type xs:string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: EN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element EN is of type xs:string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: ECD data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element ECD is of type xs:string and has not more than 32 characters.

requirement.title: UDA data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element UDA is of type xs:string and has not more than 768 characters (which equals to 576 characters coded in Base64).

requirement.title: SGN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element SGN is an integer in the range of 0-255.

requirement.title: SN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element SN is an integer in the range of 0-65535.

requirement.title: EBN data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element EBN is of type xsd:hexBinary of length 1.

requirement.title: CS data data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element CS is of type xsd:hexbinary with the following enumerated values: "00", "01", "02", "03".

requirement.title: TCI data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TCI is of type string where the first two characters correspond to a zero padded number in the range of 0-23, the third and fourth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59, the sixth and seventh character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59 and the eight and ninth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-29.

requirement.title: TCO data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TCO is of type string where the first two characters correspond to a zero padded number in the range of 0-23, the third and fourth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59, the sixth and seventh character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-59 and the eight and ninth character to a zero padded number in the range of 0-29.

requirement.title: VP data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element VP is an integer with the range 0-99.

requirement.title: JC data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element JC is of type xsd:hexBinary and restricted to the following values: "00", "01", "02" and "03".

requirement.title: CF data type
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element JC is of type xsd:hexBinary and restricted to the following values: "00" and "01".

requirement.title: TF content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element TF is of type mixed content and has only the following elements as children: 'AlphaBlack', 'AlphaRed', 'AlphaGreen', 'AlphaYellow', 'AlphaBlue', 'AlphaMagenta', 'AlphaCyan', 'AlphaWhite', 'Flash', 'Steady', 'EndBox', 'StartBox', 'NormalHeight', 'DoubleHeight', 'DoubleWidth', 'DoubleSize', 'MosaicBlack', 'MosaicRed', 'MosaicGreen', 'MosaicYellow', 'MosaicBlue', 'MosaicMagenta', 'MosaicCyan', 'MosaicWhite', 'Conceal', 'ContiguousMosaic', 'SeparatedMosaic', 'Reserved', 'BlackBackground', 'NewBackground', 'HoldMosaic', 'ReleaseMosaic', 'space', 'newline'.

requirement.title: StlSource content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that StlSource has the elements Filename and Data as mandatory children where Filename is the first and Data the second child.

requirement.title: Filename content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element Filename is of type xs:string.

requirement.title: Data content model
requirement.description: The StlXml-XSD shall validate that the content of element Data is of type xs:base64Binary.

requirement.title: WebVTT XSD according to W3C XML Schema (XSD)
requirement.description: There shall be an W3C XML Schema (XSD) that is conformant to the version 1.0 of the XML Schema Standard that can be used to validate the a WebVttXml file (WebVtt-XSD)

requirement.title: WebVTT Validation Scope
requirement.description: The Validation of an XML file with the WebVtt-XSD shall not result in false negative validation error messages but may result in false positive error messages

requirement.title: WEBVTT as root element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that WEBVTT is the root element

requirement.title: Children WEBVTT element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the the WEBVTT element has only the allowed child elements "css" and "cues" which both have the upper bound of "1"

requirement.title: Children css element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the css element has only "class" elements as children and there is a at least one class element

requirement.title: Attribute name for element 'css'
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element 'class' has the required attribute 'name'

requirement.title: One mandatory child for css element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element 'class' has at least one child

requirement.title: Content model css
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element class has only the following elements as children: 'color', 'opacity', 'visibility', 'text-decoration', 'text-shadow', 'background-color, background-image, background-repeat, background-attachment, background-position, outline-width, outline-style, outline-color, 'font-style', 'font-variant', 'font-weight', 'font-size', 'line-height', 'font-family', 'system-font', 'white-space'

requirement.title: Allowed children cues element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element cues has only 'cue' elements

requirement.title: Required children of element cue
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element cue has all of the of the following elements as children: 'id', 'timings', 'settings', 'text'

requirement.title: Allowed children cue element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element cue has no other element than the following elements as children: 'id', 'timings', 'settings', 'text'

requirement.title: Required children for timings element
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element timings has the elements 'startTime' and 'endTime' as children

requirement.title: Allowed children for element settings
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element settings has only the following elements as children: 'vertical', 'line', 'lineAlign', 'position', 'align', 'size'

requirement.title: Allowed children element text
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element text has only the following elements as children: 'class', 'italics', 'bold', 'underline', 'ruby', 'voice', 'language', 'timestamp', 'lrm' and 'rlm'

requirement.title: Allowed values element vertical
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element vertical has only one of the following values: 'rl' or 'lr'

requirement.title: Type of element line
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element line has a value that is composed of one optional "-" with one ore more digits in the range [0-9] or as second option one or more digits in the range [0-9] followed by the optional character "." together with one or more digits in the range [0-9] and the required appended character "%"

requirement.title: Allowed values element lineAlign
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element lineAlign has only one of the following values 'start', 'middle' or 'end'

requirement.title: Allowed values for element position
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element position has only one of the following values 'start', 'middle' or 'end'

requirement.title: Allowed values for element align
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element align has only one of the following values 'start', 'middle', 'end', 'left' or 'right'

requirement.title: Type of element size
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element size has a value that is composed of one or more digits in the range [0-9] followed by the optional character "." together with one or more digits in the range [0-9] and the required appended character "%"

requirement.title: Allowed children for element class
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element class has as children only zero or more className elements, text nodes and zero or more 'class', 'italics', 'bold', 'underline', 'ruby', 'voice', 'language', 'timestamp', 'lrm' or 'rlm' elements where each of the elements can appear only once (???)

requirement.title: Allowed children for element italics
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element italics has as children ony zero or more className elements, text nodes and zero or more 'class', 'voice', 'italics', 'bold', 'underline', 'ruby', 'voice', 'language', 'timestamp', 'lrm' or 'rlm' elements where each of the elements can appear only once and text nodes

requirement.title: Allowed children for element bold
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element bold has as children only zero or more className elements, text nodes and zero or more 'class', 'voice', 'italics', 'bold', 'underline', 'ruby', 'voice', 'language', 'timestamp', 'lrm' or 'rlm' elements where each of the elements can appear only once

requirement.title: Allowed children for element language
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element language has as children only zero or more className elements, text nodes and zero or more 'class', 'voice', 'italics', 'bold', 'underline', 'ruby', 'voice', 'bold', 'timestamp', 'lrm' or 'rlm' elements where each of the elements can appear only once

requirement.title: Allowed children for element timestamp
requirement.description: The WebVtt-XSD shall validate that the element timestamp has as children only zero or more className elements, text nodes and zero or more 'class', 'voice', 'italics', 'underline', 'ruby', 'voice', 'bold', 'language', 'lrm' or 'rlm' elements where each of the elements can appear only once

requirement.title: Allowed children for element lrm
